body_html: Ah, I get the point of the test error: The latest FastGFile API in the master branch has been updated and will return type str rather than bytes if the mode is r. So there is no point to add decode! I think it is OK to close this PR. Thank you again for the help recently!
body_text: Ah, I get the point of the test error: The latest FastGFile API in the master branch has been updated and will return type str rather than bytes if the mode is r. So there is no point to add decode! I think it is OK to close this PR. Thank you again for the help recently!
body: Ah, I get the point of the test error: The latest `FastGFile` API in the master branch has been updated and will return type `str` rather than `bytes` if the mode is `r`. So there is no point to add `decode`! I think it is OK to close this PR. Thank you again for the help recently!
